[L]If the above links do not work, this is an indication of one of the following[/L]:
  • [L]Interchange server not running. Usually one of[/L]:
    /etc/rc.d/init.d/interchange restart
    /usr/local/interchange/bin/restart
    [L]will work to start it.[/L]

  • [L]There are communication problems with the server. See the links below.[/L]

[L]This is the "foundation" demonstration of the Interchange electronic catalog system.[/L] [L]Links that will help you to use this software[/L]:
